project_description: A simple Flutter app that switches between a Cat and a Dog text with corresponding icons when clicked.
architecture_overview: The project follows a modular architecture with separate folders for screens, cubits, models, and widgets. The Cubit pattern is used for state management.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Entry point of the Flutter application. Provides the AnimalCubit using BlocProvider.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point of the Flutter application.

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: Contains the HomeScreen widget which is the main screen of the app.

files.name: lib/cubits/animal_cubit.dart
files.description: Contains the AnimalCubit for managing the state of the animal text.

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the state between Cat and Dog.

files.name: lib/models/animal.dart
files.description: Defines the Animal model which represents the state of the animal text.

files.name: lib/widgets/animal_text_widget.dart
files.description: Contains the AnimalTextWidget which displays the animal text and icon.

widgets.name: HomeScreen
widgets.description: The main screen of the app that shows the animal text widget.

widgets.name: AnimalTextWidget
widgets.description: A widget that displays the animal text and icon and toggles the state when clicked.

cubits.name: AnimalCubit
cubits.description: Manages the state of the animal text, toggling between Cat and Dog.

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the state between Cat and Dog.

models.name: Animal
models.description: Represents the state of the animal text.

dependencies.name: flutter_bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management using the Bloc pattern.

dependencies.name: bloc
dependencies.purpose: Core package for the Cubit pattern.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> HomeScreen: open app
HomeScreen -> AnimalCubit: get state
AnimalCubit -> Animal: current state
HomeScreen -> AnimalTextWidget: display state
User -> AnimalTextWidget: clicks text
AnimalTextWidget -> AnimalCubit: toggleAnimal
AnimalCubit -> Animal: toggle state
Animal -> HomeScreen: updated state
HomeScreen -> AnimalTextWidget: update display
@enduml
state_management_flow: The application uses the Cubit pattern for state management. The AnimalCubit manages the state of the animal text (Cat or Dog). When the user clicks the text, the toggleAnimal method is called, which toggles the state and updates the UI.
navigation_flow: The app has a single screen (HomeScreen) which displays the animal text and icon. There is no navigation to other screens.
